verses.verse: Let every<WG3956> soul<WG5590> be subject<WG5293> unto the higher<WG5242> powers<WG1849>. For<WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> power<WG1849> but<WG1508> of<WG575> God<WG2316><WG1161>: the powers<WG1849> that be<WG5607> are<WG1526> ordained<WG5021> of<WG5259> God<WG2316>.

Whosoever therefore<WG5620> resisteth<WG498> the power<WG1849>, resisteth<WG436> the ordinance<WG1296> of God<WG2316>: and<WG1161> they that resist<WG436> shall receive<WG2983> to themselves<WG1438> damnation<WG2917>.

For<WG1063> rulers<WG758> are<WG1526> not<WG3756> a terror<WG5401> to good<WG18> works<WG2041>, but<WG235> to the evil<WG2556>. Wilt thou<WG2309> then<WG1161> not<WG3361> be afraid<WG5399> of the power<WG1849>? do<WG4160> that which is good<WG18>, and<WG2532> thou shalt have<WG2192> praise<WG1868> of<WG1537> the same<WG846>:

For<WG1063> he is<WG2076> the minister<WG1249> of God<WG2316> to thee<WG4671> for<WG1519> good<WG18>. But<WG1161> if<WG1437> thou do<WG4160> that which is evil<WG2556>, be afraid<WG5399>; for<WG1063> he beareth<WG5409> not<WG3756> the sword<WG3162> in vain<WG1500>: for<WG1063> he is<WG2076> the minister<WG1249> of God<WG2316>, a revenger<WG1558> to execute wrath<WG3709> upon<WG1519> him that doeth<WG4238> evil<WG2556>.
Wherefore<WG1352> ye must needs<WG318> be subject<WG5293>, not<WG3756> only<WG3440> for<WG1223> wrath<WG3709>, but<WG235> also<WG2532> for conscience<WG4893> sake<WG1223>.

For<WG1063> for<WG1223> this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> pay ye<WG5055> tribute<WG5411> also<WG2532>: for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> God's<WG2316> ministers<WG3011>, attending continually<WG4342> upon<WG1519> this<WG5124> very thing<WG846>.

Render<WG591> therefore<WG3767> to all<WG3956> their dues<WG3782>: tribute<WG5411> to whom<WG3588> tribute<WG5411> is due; custom<WG5056> to whom<WG3588> custom<WG5056>; fear<WG5401> to whom<WG3588> fear<WG5401>; honour<WG5092> to whom<WG3588> honour<WG5092>.
Owe<WG3784> no man<WG3367> any thing<WG3367>, but<WG1508> to love<WG25> one another<WG240>: for<WG1063> he that loveth<WG25> another<WG2087> hath fulfilled<WG4137> the law<WG3551>.

For<WG1063> this, Thou shalt<WG3431> not<WG3756> commit adultery<WG3431>, Thou shalt<WG5407> not<WG3756> kill<WG5407>, Thou shalt<WG2813> not<WG3756> steal<WG2813>, Thou shalt<WG5576> not<WG3756> bear false witness<WG5576>, Thou shalt<WG1937> not<WG3756> covet<WG1937>; and<WG2532> if there be any<WG1536> other<WG2087> commandment<WG1785>, it is briefly comprehended<WG346> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> saying<WG3056>, namely<WG1722>, Thou shalt love<WG25> thy<WG4675> neighbour<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself<WG1438>.
Love<WG26> worketh<WG2038> no<WG3756> ill<WG2556> to his neighbour<WG4139>: therefore<WG3767> love<WG26> is the fulfilling<WG4138> of the law<WG3551>.

And<WG2532> that<WG5124>, knowing<WG1492> the time<WG2540>, that<WG3754> now<WG2235> it is high time<WG5610> to awake<WG2248><WG1453> out of<WG1537> sleep<WG5258>: for<WG1063> now<WG3568> is our<WG2257> salvation<WG4991> nearer<WG1452> than<WG2228> when<WG3753> we believed<WG4100>.

The night<WG3571> is far spent<WG4298><WG1161>, the day<WG2250> is at hand<WG1448>: let us<WG659> therefore<WG3767> cast off<WG659> the works<WG2041> of darkness<WG4655>, and<WG2532> let us put on<WG1746> the armour<WG3696> of light<WG5457>.

Let us walk<WG4043> honestly<WG2156>, as<WG5613> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250>; not<WG3361> in rioting<WG2970> and<WG2532> drunkenness<WG3178>, not<WG3361> in chambering<WG2845> and<WG2532> wantonness<WG766>, not<WG3361> in strife<WG2054> and<WG2532> envying<WG2205>.
But<WG235> put ye on<WG1746> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> make<WG4160> not<WG3361> provision<WG4307> for<WG1519> the flesh<WG4561>, to fulfil the lusts<WG1939> thereof.
